abilities.name: Champion
abilities.description: 1 model in this unit can be a Bringer-of-the-Word.

abilities.name: Standard Bearer
abilities.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can bear an Icon of Entropy. If this unit includes any models bearing Icons of Entropy, each time a model from this unit is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, before removing that model from play, roll a dice. On a **6**, pick 1 enemy unit within **3"** of the slain model. That unit suffers **1 mortal wound**.

abilities.name: Musician
abilities.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Plague Harbinger. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit if it has one.

abilities.name: Book of Woes
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within **13"** of this unitâ€™s Bringer-of-the-Word and roll a dice. On a **1-2, nothing happens**. On a **3-4**, that unit suffers **1 mortal wound**. On a **5-6**, that unit suffers **D3 mortal wounds**. This ability has no effect on **NURGLE** units.

abilities.name: Foetid Weapons
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this unit is **6**, that attack has a Rend characteristic of **-2** instead of **-**.

abilities.name: Frenzied Assault
abilities.description: **Add 1** to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons if it made a charge move in the same turn.
